title: Notarized documents and attestations
dataVerified: Signatory names, notary public name, notary commission number, notary seal details, notarization date, jurisdiction, document type
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Notary stamps/seals suit OCR. Legal validity verification. Domain binding verifies notary commission with state authority. Prevents fraudulent notarizations. Critical for affidavits, powers of attorney, real estate documents. Courts can verify notarization authenticity instantly.
